meanings.sent1: The spangliest stars lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was the spangliest at the party.
meanings.sent3: The spangliest diamond in the jewelry store caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent4: The spangliest water droplets on the leaves glistened in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The spangliest fireworks painted the sky with bursts of color.

meanings.sent1: She loved to wear the spangliest jewelry.
meanings.sent2: The spangliest of all the decorations was the golden ornament.
meanings.sent3: The spangliest of the coins in the fountain was the lucky penny.
meanings.sent4: The spangliest gem in the treasure chest was the prized possession.
meanings.sent5: The spangliest costume at the ball shimmered under the lights.
